Use natural ingredients:ng natural ingredients such as vinegar, baking soda, and lemon juice to clean surfaces and disinfect.
Boil water: Boiling water is an effective way to kill germs and bacteria. Use it to clean surfaces and disinfect.
Use cloth and water: Use a cloth soaked in water to clean surfaces and disinfect.
Use a toothbrush: Use a toothbrush to clean small and hard-to-reach areas such as crevices and grout.
Use essential oils: Essential oils such as tea tree oil and lavender oil have antibacterial properties and can be used to clean surfaces and disinfect.
